description: Registry defining intrinsic properties and operational parameters for all RRP action primitives. This prevents relying on undefined magic strings.

HALT_EXECUTION.purpose: Immediately stops all active computational threads and persists memory state.

ISOLATE_STATE.purpose: Forks current execution state for non-interruptive forensic analysis.

NOTIFY_GOVERNOR.purpose: Sends critical alert to external governance layer, requiring explicit acknowledgement.

HARD_RESET.purpose: Initiates a full, cold restart of the system.
